document_data.name: Daruk
document_data.mainbody: '''Daruk''' was a [[human]] [[bard]] of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] and a friend of the [[Ikemmu]] merchant [[Tatigan Carrlock]]. He was said to be beloved by [[Shar]].{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road|3186}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, Daruk traveled with a caravan from Ikemmu to [[Rashemen]]. Along the way, Daruk helped defeat bandit and [[winter wolf]] attacks.<ref>{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road|?}}
document_data.Abilities: Daruk had a special connection to Shar and was able to channel some of her power. He was able to infuse some of Shar's power into the [[shadar-kai (Netherese)|shadar-kai]] [[Ashok]] to help him defeat a winter wolf attack.{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road|3893}}
document_data.Personality: Daruk had a cocky demeanor and often annoyed those around him.<ref>{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road|?}}
